data.text: @ElPasoTXGov @RepEscobar Looks like somebody forgot to tell Covid the pandemic is over. Maybe somebody should tell the anti-maskers as well. Funny how they can wear their hats day and night, inside and out, because they are bald or need a haircut. But they can't wear a mask to save their own life.

A total of 231,219 individuals recovered, 2,125 cases were reported to be active, and 1,635,714 COVID-19 vaccine doses (to include additional booster/third doses) were administered in El Paso at the close of CDC Week 9.
4/4

The deaths included a man in his 30s, a man in his 50s, a female in her 50s, 2 men in their 60s, a woman in her 60s, 7 men in their 70s, 4 women in their 70s, 4 men in their 80s, 2 women in their 80s, and a woman in her 90s. 
3/4

The community also reported 24 deaths; however, the deaths occurred over a period of 3 months. All 24 patients who passed away had underlying health conditions and 9 were breakthrough deaths; meaning 15 of the 24 deaths—62.5 percent—were not fully vaccinated.
2/4
